mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SIGNCLUB VALUES( concat('sc_', SIGNCLUB_NO_SEQ.nextval), #{c_num}, #{u_id}, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE CLUB SET C_ENTRY = C_ENTRY +'1' WHERE c_num = #{c_num}
mapper.select: SELECT S.SC_NUM SC_NUM, S.C_NUM C_NUM, C.U_ID U_ID, C.C_TITLE C_TITLE, C.C_PERIOD C_PERIOD, C.C_DATE C_DATE, C.C_PLACE C_PLACE, I.CIMG_NAME CIMG_NAME FROM SIGNCLUB S, CLUB C, CLUBIMAGE I WHERE S.C_NUM = C.C_NUM and C.C_NUM = I.C_NUM and S.U_ID = #{user}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SIGNCLUB WHERE U_ID = #{u_id} AND SC_NUM = #{sc_num}
